styleObject.class: nds-border_top nds-border_right nds-border_bottom nds-border_left nds-p-around_small nds-p-top_medium nds-m-top_x-small
styleObject.style:
background-color:#F7FCFD;  background-repeat:initial;   border-top: #E8F4F9 1px solid;border-right: #E8F4F9 1px solid;border-bottom: #E8F4F9 1px solid;border-left: #E8F4F9 1px solid; 
    border-radius:2px;
